© 2024 Alejandro Moreno

Hi, I'm Alejandro. I'm product designer, currently working on Geomites, a mobile game.

I love designing and creating digital experiences that solve real user problems and help companies achieve their goals. I consider myself a positive, proactive, methodical, self-taught person, and I put my all into every project I undertake.

When I'm not working, I enjoy exercising, reading, traveling, spending time with family and friends, cooking, and learning new skills.

Product designer at Geomites

2023 - present

As a product designer, I am responsible for conducting market research, heuristic and content evaluations, information architecture, user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and working closely with developers to ensure designs are implemented effectively

Product design at Atipiko Tours

2023

Atipiko Tours is a company dedicated to organizing trips worldwide. The objective of the project was to design and develop a website that would establish the company's online presence and enable users to view offers and make reservations

Product designer at Tattoo Paradise

2022

Tattoo Paradise is a personal project that entails building a mobile application from the ground up, enabling users in the realm of tattoos to browse designs and discover independent studios and artists based on their preferences

Product design at Senzo Studio

2022

Senzo Studio is a VFX company dedicated to the creation of visual effects for film production companies, TV series, and other sectors such as video games, music, and advertising. The objective of the project is the design and development of a website that positions the company online and allows users to obtain basic information and view the company's showreel

Co-founder at Dako

2021 - 2022

Dako was a personal project, through which we created a brand for food delivery in Madrid, specializing in fresh pasta. The project didn't come to fruition due to funding issues

Purchasing manager at Promam

2021

Promam is an industrial machinery manufacturing company, specializing in the energy sector, specifically in liquefied petroleum gas. Its main activity is to supply companies in the machinery sector with the necessary equipment, spare parts, and maintenance to support their operations

Services

My goal is to unite users and business objectives in my designs. To achieve this, I specialize in the following activities

User research

Understanding users' needs and preferences through the collection and analysis of data on their behavior, includes conducting usability tests and experience evaluations, creating detailed user profiles and empathy maps

Ideation

Creatively generating innovative solutions to address specific design challenges. This is achieved through collaborative brainstorming sessions that foster concept generation and exploration of multiple approaches

Facilitation

Guiding effective and efficient collaboration among team members and stakeholders to achieve project goals. This includes conducting workshops, meetings, and design sprints to encourage open communication, creative thinking, and consensus building

Prototyping

Creating simplified, functional representations of a product to test and validate design concepts, developing interactive models that simulate the user experience, allowing for early feedback and iteration. Aiding in the refinement of the final product and ensuring its alignment with user needs and preferences

Design systems

Creating and maintaining a comprehensive set of design standards, guidelines, and reusable components to ensure consistency and cohesiveness across all digital products and platforms. This includes establishing a unified visual language, typography, color schemes, and interface elements that streamline the design and development process

Communication

Effectively conveying design concepts, ideas, and research findings to various stakeholders, including team members, clients, and users. This includes presenting user research insights, design proposals, and usability test results in a clear and concise manner

Recommended readings

I love reading and learning new things. Here are some readings I can recommend to you

UX/UI design

About face the essential of interaction design

Written by industry experts, this book focuses on the essential principles of interaction design. It provides a detailed guide on how to design products that are intuitive, efficient, and enjoyable for users

View book
UX/UI design

The design of every day things

Don Norman is a reference in design and cognitive psychology. In this book, he explores how people interact with objects in their everyday lives and how these principles can be applied to the design of digital products to make them more efficient and satisfying

View book
UX/UI design

Don't make me think

This book is a classic in the field of interaction design. Krug presents fundamental principles of usability in an accessible and practical way, focusing on the idea that good design should be intuitive and understandable without effort

View book
UX/UI design

Seductive interaction design

Anderson addresses the emotional aspect of interaction design. He explores how designers can create engaging and captivating experiences by understanding and leveraging users' emotions

View book
Productivity

Getting Things Done

This book is a classic in time management and productivity. David Allen presents a comprehensive system for organizing tasks and improving efficiency

View book
Productivity

The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

Covey explores seven habits that can transform personal and professional effectiveness. It's a highly influential book in the productivity realm

View book
Productivity

Atomic Habits

While not specifically focused on productivity, this book explores how small habits can have a significant impact on performance and effectiveness

View book
Productivity

Deep Work

Newport examines the importance of deep concentration in a world full of distractions. He offers strategies to cultivate the ability to do meaningful, uninterrupted work

View book
Psychology

Chatter

Explores the impact of our inner voice on mental well-being. It offers insights and strategies to manage self-talk positively

View book
Psychology

Thinking, Fast and Slow

Provides valuable insights into human decision-making. Designers can benefit from understanding the cognitive processes that influence user choices and behaviors

View book
Psychology

Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion

Explores the psychology of persuasion. Cialdini outlines key principles shaping human behavior, offering insights into effective communication

View book
Psychology

Predictably Irrational: The Hidden Forces That Shape Our Decisions

Designers can gain insights into how to anticipate and leverage these irrational tendencies in creating more effective designs

View book

FAQ

Some of the most frequently asked questions I receive

"I enjoy the iteration process, through which I establish the design process based on different stages: research, user empathy, ideation, wireframing, prototyping, feedback, and iteration, high-fidelity designs, and development."

"I possess several valuable skills as a designer that enable me to identify and solve user problems. I am empathetic, a good listener, and observer. I have a toolkit that allows me to create, coupled with development knowledge to bring designs to life."

"I believe that being organized and methodical is key to meeting established deadlines and making accurate delivery forecasts."

"I enjoy staying informed about the project's needs and maintaining close collaboration with all its members. Understanding the company's needs as a whole rather than isolated departments is important to me."

"I started working as a product designer in 2021. During this time, I have self-taught and have been able to assist companies in creating and improving their designs."
